Funds are paid by GreaterGood.org to benefiting organizations as a grant., 106150=July 20, 2015 - I love this shirt. It is so comfortable and I get a LOT of compliments when wearing it., 106580=December 29, 2014 - I got this shirt and it is really beautiful and for such a great cause. It's very soft and I have a nice pink blazer jacket to wear to accompany it, along with a nice pair of green or black slacks, 107123=December 4, 2014 - Beautiful. I ordered a size larger than I wear and it was MUCH smaller. The same with short sleeves top, I ordered my size and will have to give it to a very small young woman., 108078=August 15, 2013 - This did not run large for me. It is bright and beautiful. It will be fall before I can wear it.so I am looking forward to it., 108549=May 26, 2013 - This is even more beautiful in person! It runs big so I purchased a small rather than medium and it's perfect! And I LOVE the bling!}
textBeforeTable: Sizing in inches/centimeters: Garment Measurements: Due to the special sublimation screen-printing process, normal variance and creased design is to be expected and is part of the overall design characteristic. Imported Machine wash cold; do not bleach; lay flat to dry Designed exclusively by GreaterGood Network Rhinestone accents on shirt front 95% polyester & 5% spandex Little is more beautiful than awareness, except for perhaps awareness dressed up in a bouquet and rhinestones! Our stretchy-soft shirt presents a vibrant pink ribbon glittering among the flowers.
